name: Physics
aboutCourse:
This Physics course for ages 7-14 allows the trainee to become a subject specialist for middle years across Key Stage 2 and 3.  There are 2 placements allowing for experience across key stages in 2 different schools.

The first placement runs from September to December, and placement 2 from January to June.  There is regular training on Fridays at Cleeve Training Hub

This is an exciting course as it allows trainees to enthuse and engage younger students to science and encourage future scientists, there is also the opportunity to teach beyond the science curriculum.
interviewProcess: The interview consists of a short teaching episode of 25 minutes to a small group of KS3 students, this is followed by a panel interview with representatives from Cleeve Training Hub and University of Gloucestershire
howSchoolPlacementsWork:
There are 2 placements during the middle years Physics PGCE through Schools Direct.  The first placement runs from September to December, and placement 2 from January to June.  There is regular training on Fridays at Cleeve Training Hub.

Placement Schools for the cross phase PGCE are based in middle schools in Worcestershire and secondary schools in Gloucestershire
personalQualities: We are looking for enthusiastic trainees aspiring to be outstanding teachers.   We want to work with trainees who have the highest expectations from young people and a desire to ensure that young people have the very best opportunities.
